title: NewsBreak - Scottish High Court Rules U.K. Prorogation Unlawful
text:
NewsBreak - Scottish High Court Rules U.K. Prorogation Unlawful

Forex 5 hours ago (Sep 11, 2019 05:26AM ET)

© Reuters. Investing.com - Three judges on the Scottish High Court ruled that U.K. Prime Minister’s Boris Johnson’s decision to suspend parliament is unlawful. An appeal is expected to be heard in the Supreme Court on Tuesday. • rose 0.1% to 1.2356 as of 5:23 AM ET (9:23 GMT). • fell 0.2% to 0.8921. • The yield rose 5.5% to 0.674.

NewsBreak - Scottish High Court Rules U.K. Prorogation Unlawful
